name: Barong Bangkal (Dream Pig)
description:
#MaskSeries : Barong Bangkal

Barong Bangkal is a barong in the form of an adult pig. In Bali, male adult pigs are called Bangkal, while the female is called Bangkal.

That's why this type of barong is also called Barong Bangkung. Usually Barong Bangkal is performed by ngelelawang or door-to-door dancing around the village to ward off evil forces, during the Galungan-Kuningan celebration.

This barong is danced by two dancers to the accompaniment of gamelan batel/ttamburan.

---
